name: Cyber Kitten
description:
Please leave some feedback and if you liked the game, spread the word! <3

A shoot-em-up highly inspired by games like Super Crate Box, done with a little twist.

Avoid and shoot enemies, collect as many milk bottles as you can before you get ran over.. After collecting certain amount of bottles you proceed to the next level and unlock a new weapon! >:)

Weapons are saved when you quit the game so when you get back for another session you will have more variety this time.

Controls:

WSAD - move

Arrow Keys - shoot

R - restart

CHANGELOG

Changelog v.1 (17-02-02)

  • Fixed some minor bugs
  • Added new music for later stages

Planned updates:

  • Add gamepad support
  • Fix other minor bugs
